roleset.name: invite, again

example.name: With purpose
example.text: After six years of investigation, the New Zealand police have recently re-summoned the coroner for questions because no confirmed evidence has been found so far to prove how the "murderer" got the methanol into the decedent's body.
example.arg: because no confirmed evidence has been found so far to prove how

roleset.note: RESUMMON-V NOTES: Frames file for 're-summon' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to 'summon.' (from resummon.01-v predicate notes)
